_description: James Ryman, A song of the Nativity — eight quatrains (abab) and burden (cc): ‘A meyden myelde a chielde hath bore / Mankyende to blis forto restore’

CULEe112.First Lines:
As longe before prophesy seydeWith vs to dwelle now criste is
                    comme…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…That art borne of a virgyne freeBothe god & man of
                    myghtes moost
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 208.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 177; 1977, 156-7.
